thread.title: Hub sizzles for MSPCA benefit
thread.title_full: Hub sizzles for MSPCA benefit | Boston Herald

author: Erica Corsano
title: Hub sizzles for MSPCA benefit
text:
Animal lovers feasted for a great cause last night at Cook in Newton to raise money for MSPCA-Angell. As part of the suburban restaurant’s “Cook for Charity” celebrity chef series, yours truly hosted.
Thanks to chef/owner Paul Turano, I learned how to make my very own signature flatbread the “Corsano,” topped with eggplant caponata, goat cheese, arugula and balsamic glaze. The proceeds from each $15 flatbread will be donated to MSPCA Angell.
Furry friend-loving guests included designer David Josef, PR gal Joanna Humphrey Flynn, retail marketing guru Joan Jolley, my radio partner-in-crime Jonathan Soroff and glam gal about town Jane Conway Caspe.
If you weren’t able to join us last night, please consider making a donation online to support the amazing work they do! Go to mspca.org.
